dc:title: A New Year Begins
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Lauds their daily routine of prayer, reading, and hospitality in New York and around the country. Says they feed 900 for breakfast, and a couple of hundred at lunch and supper.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 369 1940-12-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
